bpp/descriptor.name: Easypay India PVT LTD.
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: Easy Pay Incepted and incorporated to create a digitally inclusive world. Back in 2014, while researching & passionately working on the consumer service industry, we were mused with this idea of unleashing a brand called Easy Pay with strong conviction of “Organizing the Unorganized” retail sector in India.

descriptor.name: HOMECROWN Premium Polyester Fabric 7 Feet Flower Design Door Curtains Floral and Plain -Modern Silk Look parde for Home, Living Room, Bedroom, Offices (7 x 4 Feet, Maroon) - Set of 3 Pc
descriptor.short_desc: HOMECROWN presents readymade door curtains. Made from Polyester and polyester fabric and give you the finest with better finish. These curtains will not shrink on washing also their color fastness is good. These beautiful curtains panels are a great modern addition to any room and office. Fresh design provides a sophisticated look and feel. It's a perfect choice for your living room, bedroom, family room, dining room, bathroom, office, or any other door space that could use that perfect finishing touch. They have pre-made eyelet curtain easy to hang and managing. We have a dedicated team for quality check, who examine under several parameters to ensure that you are provided with zero defect products. To experience the pleasure of superior quality Product, buy this Curtain from our HOMECROWN. Features :- It?s Give the graceful and modern look for any bedroom. Clear Print Quality Stitch, Finish: Ultra Soft Curtain vibrant color, providing the needed charm to complete any Home Washing Instructions: Machine Wash, Hand Wash, Do Not Bleach, Tumble Dry.

descriptor.name: HOMECROWN Floral Cotton Blend Table Cover Cloth for Centre Table and 4 Seater Dining Table (60x40 Inch, Red)
descriptor.short_desc: Home Crown was built and launched with the idea of bringing quality and variety in home furnishing and decor. Also to ensure that home furnishing is not only about decorating but matter of comfort and style too. We believe in saying Home is where heart is. It?s where life revolves and we always inspire to make home beautiful heaven. Give the beauty to your home which you always wanted with the quality products which we made. Home Crown is an apt pick for you if you are inclined towards eye-catching and vibrant home decor and home furnishing items. We bring the table cover which is so beautiful that it will add brightness to your home. This table cover is excellent to protect the table from scratched and stains from day to day usage while ensuring protection to your furniture and also it will provide an attractive and beautiful look to your home. It comes in 40x60 Inches or 102x152 CM dimension

descriptor.name: Wooden One Dwr Stool Brass Fited / Living Room / Bed room / Bed side / Side Table
descriptor.short_desc: Handmade  Delivery from a small business in India   Materials: solid wood  Width: 11 inches Height: 24 inches Depth: 11 inches STYLISH DESIGN: The Latest Simple Design Form A Harmonious Combination Of Modern And Classic; This wooden stool long Stool Big Brass Fitted cum Side Table Can Not Only Blend With Your Rooms And Dcor But Add A Sense Of Elegant To Your Bedroom And Living Room As Well .  VERSATILE: Features 1 Drawer And Storage Shelf For Storing Small Things Like Remote Controllers, Snacks And So On, Easily And Neatly Organize Your Bedroom And Living Room; Also Can Be Used As A Displaying Area For Your Family Photos And Handicrafts and use it for sitting in kitchen  SPACE SAVER: Slimmer And More Delicate wooden stool cum Side Table Specially Designed For Narrow Spaces Such As Sofa Side And Bed Side, end table; Fully Utilizes The Space And Yet Not Occupies Too Much Of It
